scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p src/common && cp ../../common/logger.ts src/common/ && echo '// Auto-generated from /common - do not edit directly' | cat - src/common/logger.ts > temp && mv temp src/common/logger.ts
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=browser --outfile=dist/index.js --format=esm && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/index.cjs --format=cjs
